de.iss.mv2.security

Interface MessageCryptorSettings

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Cloneable<MessageCryptorSettings>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AESWithRSACryptoSettings

    public interface MessageCryptorSettings
extends Cloneable<MessageCryptorSettings>
    Configures the cryptographic processing of all processed messages. AESWithRSACryptoSettings is the default implementation of this interface.
    Author:
    Marcel Singer

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • getKeyGenerator

        SymetricKeyGenerator getKeyGenerator()
        Returns the key generator to be used.

      • getSymmetricEncryptionStream

        java.io.OutputStream getSymmetricEncryptionStream(java.io.OutputStream baseStream,
                                                  byte[] key,
                                                  byte[] iv)
                                           throws java.io.IOException,
                                                  CryptoException
        Creates an output stream for encrypted data output. The stream must be fully initialized.
        Parameters:
        baseStream - The underlying stream.
        key - The key to use for encryption.
        iv - The IV to use for encryption.
        Returns:
        A fully initialized stream.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs.
        CryptoException - Is thrown if there was an error during the initialization of the encryption.

      • getSymmetricDecryptionStream

        java.io.InputStream getSymmetricDecryptionStream(java.io.InputStream baseStream,
                                                 byte[] key,
                                                 byte[] iv)
                                          throws java.io.IOException,
                                                 CryptoException
        Creates an input stream for encrypted data input. The stream must be fully initialized.
        Parameters:
        baseStream - The underlying stream containing the encrypted data.
        key - The key to use.
        iv - The IV to use.
        Returns:
        A fully initialized stream.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs.
        CryptoException - Is thrown if there was an error during the initialization of the cipher.

      • getDesiredSymmetricKeySize

        int getDesiredSymmetricKeySize()
        Returns the desired key size of this settings.
        Returns:
        The desired symmetric key size in bytes.
